containsTextTooltip.message: E.g. 'google.com' means all pages that url contains 'google.com' like https://www.google.com, https://www.google.com/abc, https://xyz.google.com

importDescription.message: Import your bookmarks from the current browser to SeekBot. This process will not delete your browser bookmarks, and it will only import URL, name, and folder information, excluding content. The content will be imported when you open the respective page.

importHistoryDescription.message: Import your browser history to SeekBot. This import process will not delete your browser history; it will only bring in the URL, name, and folder information, excluding content. The content will be imported when you open the respective page.

importHistoryDetail.message: Import passed $1 days browser history, and max import $2 records

searchDescription.message: Search bookmarks or pages by title, url, tags, content

savePageDescription.message: Save current page without add a browser bookmark

bookmarkPageDescription.message: Bookmark current page will save page also add a browser bookmark

tooltipBookmarked.message: Click to remove bookmark current page

failed.message: Failed, will auto retry in background

serviceNotHealthTitle.message: Unable to connect to the SeekBot desktop application

serviceNotHealthDetail.message: Please ensure that the SeekBot desktop application is currently running. If the application is running, please allow a few moments for the connection to establish. If you still encounter this message after a brief wait, kindly consider restarting the SeekBot desktop application
